## Quarto
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

first_fun <- function(x) {
  2*x
}
first_fun(3)
```


```{r}

D(expr = expression((2*(3*x +2)^4) - 5),name = "x")

next_function <- function(x) {
  2 * (4 * (3 * (3 * x + 2)^3))
}
next_function(1.2)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  labs(x = "Body mass (g)",
       y = "Flipper length (mm)",
       title = "Palmer penguin size measurements",
       subtitle = "Palmer Archipelago, Antarctice (2007 - 2009)",
       caption = "Collected by Dr. Kristen Gorman and colleagues at Palmer Station LTER") +
  facet_wrap(~island) +
  theme_minimal()

```
